result.ai.defaultSummary: This food appears balanced. Assuming no hidden allergens, it fits well within a moderate diet.
result.photoSave.promptTitle: Save scan photos to your device gallery?
result.photoSave.promptMessage: We can also save analyzed photos to your Photos app for easier sharing and backup.

This barcode is not registered.
Would you like to analyze the label with a photo?

scan.alert.aimBarcode: Please point the barcode at the camera.
camera.error.missingImage: Unable to load image information. Please try again.
camera.error.locationUnavailable: Location is unavailable. Location-based allergy filtering may not be applied.
camera.error.file: Unable to load the image file. Please choose another photo.
camera.error.analysis: There is a problem connecting to the server. Check your network and try again.
camera.alert.serverRetryMessage:
A temporary server issue occurred.
Would you like to try again?

history.alert.deleteItemsMessageTemplate: Are you sure you want to delete {count} items?

tripStats.alert.failedToGetLocation: Failed to get location. Please try again.

onboarding.welcome.title: Welcome to FoodLens
onboarding.welcome.subtitle: AI-powered food analysis to keep you safe from allergens, anywhere in the world.

onboarding.profile.subtitle: Help us personalize your experience with basic info.
onboarding.permissions.title: Let's set up your lens
onboarding.permissions.subtitle:
To protect you from allergens,
our AI needs to see what you eat.

onboarding.allergies.title: Your Allergies
onboarding.allergies.subtitle: Select allergens to avoid. Tap the severity badge to adjust the warning level.
onboarding.allergies.severityHint: Tap to cycle: Mild → Moderate → Severe
onboarding.complete.title: You're all set!
onboarding.complete.subtitle: Your personalized allergen shield is ready. We've calibrated FoodLens to your specific needs.
onboarding.complete.noSevere: No severe allergens detected — great news!
onboarding.complete.aiReadyDesc: FoodLens will now auto-scan labels for your specific triggers.
onboarding.complete.permissionsSummaryHi: You can change these later in iPhone Settings > FoodLens.
